resources.string: Enter Project Name(Open project when exsit)
Autopilot：when Autopilot is enabled,disabled or end
Detection：when being spotted or spot enemy

"Cons：when consumables activate or deactivate
-AAActive：when AA activate
-AAEnd：when AA deactivate
-EngineBoostActive：when EngineBoost activate
-EngineBoostActive_Shima：when Shimakaze activate EngineBoost
-EngineBoostEnd：when EngineBoost deactivate
-FrontierActive：when Frontline Station activate -JP carrier consumables
-FrontierEnd：when Frontline Station deactivate -JP carrier consumables
-ProblemSolved_Fire：when damage control activate -fire
-ProblemSolved_Flood：when EngineBoost activate -flood
-SmokeActive：when smoke generator activate
-SmokeEnd：when smoke generator deactivate "

Domination：domination status,domination point status
-Ally_Capture：Ally taken a key point
-Ally_NearWin：Ally domination point above 800
-Enemy_Capture：Enemy taken a key point
-Enemy_NearWin：Enemy domination point above 800

"HitAndKill：when destroy or good hits
-DestroyAlly：Destroy Ally ships
—AirCarrier：Destroy Ally Carrier
—Battleship：Destroy Ally Battleship
—Cruiser：Destroy Ally Cruiser
—Destroyer：Destroy Ally Destroyer
-DestroyEnemy：Destroy Enemy ships
—AirCarrier：Destroy Enemy Carrier
—Battleship：Destroy Enemy Battleship
—Cruiser：Destroy Enemy Cruiser
—Destroyer：Destroy Enemy Destroyer
-GoodHit：Citadel or torpedo hit "
LastHope：when being the last one of team

ModuleDisable：when module been destroyed or disabled
-Engine：engine disabled
-MainGun：main battery destroyed or disabled
—Crit：main battery disabled
—Die：main battery destroyed
-StearingGear：steering gear disabled
-TorpedoTube：torpedo tube destroyed or disabled

"PlaneGroupId：plane squadron id
-DiveBomber：dive bomber squadrons
-Fighter：fighter squadrons
-TorpedoBomber：torpedo bomber squadrons "

PlaneState：squadron status
-DiveBomber：dive bomber squadron
-Fighter：fighter squadron
-TorpedoBomber：torpedo bomber squadron
—AirBorne：squadron take off
—AtPos：squadron is at position and waiting for command
—Destroy：squadron been shot down
—Engage：squadron is engaging enemy
—Land：squadron return to ship
—Ready：squadron is ready for take off
—TangoDown：squadron shot down enemy
—UnderAttack：squadron is under attack
Requiring Permissions to work:read,write and manage your storage(management is for deleting whole files in project,exclude micro SD card,OTG devices)
take screenshot and report to developer email:jam9112229@gmail.com
Mod Version：if you\'re keep updating your mods,version of the latest modpack should higher than previous one
